A podshof man on an old Toyota caught up with a Subaru in Berdsk
12:48 11/02/2019 0

The registration of traffic accidents without injuries, which occurred today, November 2, in the morning on Krasnaya Sibir Street, had to deal with traffic police inspectors.

“Europrotocol will not help,” emergency commissioner Yevgeny Nenashev said about the collision of two cars - Toyota Corolla and Subaru Forester. - The culprit is drunk.
The culprit of a small accident, referred to in the driver’s environment as “catch-up,” the avark identified the driver of the Toyota Corolla, who, in this situation, crashed into the Subaru. The traffic police inspectors communicate with him at the scene.
However, the law enforcement authorities did not begin to share information with the press about the amount of "taken to the chest" that was too dispersed, judging by the braking distance on the pavement, by the "racer" from Toyota. The corresponding check according to the regulations is yet to come. Therefore, let us dwell on the non-medical conclusion of the emergency commissioner, who, of course, must be checked by the traffic police.
It is appropriate to remind in this connection to other motorists who drive behind a wheel not quite sober what the risk of such a ride is. And this is not a little bit - a fine of 30 thousand rubles (if I got caught for the first time) and a deprivation of a driver’s license. Also, do not discount the lovers of a ride and, so to speak, the attendant thousands of rubles. For the repair of vehicles damaged by them, for the services of a tow truck and a fine parking lot.
